data.title: Big Two Card Sorting
data.statement:
In the game "Big Two" (大老二, 鋤大弟), the cards are valued first by their <<rank>>
{{3, 4, ..., 10, J, Q, K, A, 2}} and then by their <<suit>> {{D, C, H, S}} (Diamonds, Clubs, Hearts, Spades). The lowest valued card is the 3 of Diamonds ({{3D}}) and the highest valued card is the 2 of Spades ({{2S}}).

You are dealt 13 [[cards]]. Given these [[cards]] in a single space-separated line, sort them by ascending value and print the space-separated result.

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: QD JH KC 4C 9D 5D KH 8S 7H KD 2D JC AC
testCases.testOut: 4C 5D 7H 8S 9D JC JH QD KD KC KH AC 2D

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: 3S 6D 5C QH 9H 10C AS AH 5D AD 4S JS KH
testCases.testOut: 3S 4S 5D 5C 6D 9H 10C JS QH KH AD AH AS

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn: QD JH 2H 10H AS KS 2S KH 10C 10S QH KC JD
testCases.testOut: 10C 10H 10S JD JH QD QH KC KH KS AS 2H 2S

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: 10C 2S JS JC KH AD 10S AS 2C 10D QD AC 2D
testCases.testOut: 10D 10C 10S JC JS QD KH AD AC AS 2D 2C 2S

data.constraints: There will never be any duplicate cards or cards of invalid form.
data.stubGenerator:
read cards:string(42)
write Big2Sorted

STATEMENT
Sort it out!
data.inputDescription: <<1 Line :>> An unordered, space-separated list of 13 [[cards]] in the format "[[rank]][[suit]]"

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In the game "Big Two" (大老二, 鋤大弟), the cards are valued first by their rank
3, 4, ..., 10, J, Q, K, A, 2 and then by their suit D, C, H, S (Diamonds, Clubs, Hearts, Spades). The lowest valued card is the 3 of Diamonds (3D) and the highest valued card is the 2 of Spades (2S).

You are dealt 13 cards. Given these cards in a single space-separated line, sort them by ascending value and print the space-separated result.
Input
1 Line : An unordered, space-separated list of 13 cards in the format "ranksuit"
Output
1 Line : The ordered cards, space-separated
Constraints
There will never be any duplicate cards or cards of invalid form.
Example
Input
10D 4H 2H 7C 2S KS JD 3D 7H 9C 6H 10C AH
Output
3D 4H 6H 7C 7H 9C 10D 10C JD KS AH 2H 2S
